page.title: 14Social Life Near Goonhavern.
page.content: There is a tendancy to centre social life in events in the area.This is partially because of limited transport facilities; in many parts of the area there is no public transport service readily available in the evenings.It is partially because of preference. People enjoy meeting at coffee mornings,garden parties and barbeques. Numerous events are held to compare food,plants and flowers grown locally.Groups meet to share and develope country crafts and a lot of enjoyment in derived from creating attractive ornaments and displays for the house.The Church is important and most families attend at least on the main festival days.Children are encouraged to go to Sunday school. Social activities connected with the Church are numerous for both adults and children.
